name: Falling Conflicts (RhysLamble)
description:
2-4 Player Party Game Platformer... Thing.

Out play your friends with love and hate whilst competing in fast paced mini-games.

Whack up close,

Love from afar.

Requires 2-4 Gamepads

Made for the UE4 Winter Jam 2019

Joel Hodges,

Rhys Lamble,

Joao Miguel da Silva

All original assets

Music: Free Music Archive - Phillip Gross
